description:
GlusterFS is an open source, distributed file system capable of scaling to several petabytes and handling thousands of clients. GlusterFS clusters together storage building blocks over Infiniband RDMA or TCP/IP interconnect, aggregating disk and memory resources and managing data in a single global namespace. In this presentation I will be giving the introduction to GlusterFS : Distribution, Replication and other features of GlusterFS
